cells.data:
Procedure:

1. Fix insect specimen in ethanol, chloroform and glacial acetic acid (6:3:1) at 4Â°C over night. 
2. Transfer 10% Sodium Hydroxide for 24 hours.
3. Wash in in water for 6hr
4. Transfer to 33% Acetic Acid for 24 hours.
5. Wash in water for 6 to 8 hours
6. For 10 minutes each submerge the collar into 40% ethonal (2 times), 70 % ethonal and 100 % (ethonal) (2 times) ethanol at room temperature.
7. histoclear (MB), 50/50 v/v MB and paraffin 60 minutes 
8. paraffin 60 mintues (2x)
9. let dry over night
10. section
